languages.text: "Я собирал информацию — без этого предпринимать меры было бы опрометчиво. Сейчас время для согласования действий и обсуждения рисков — а они велики, учитывая, что мы в меньшинстве и на незнакомой территории".

traits.locale_text: "Пока перевес сил не на нашей стороне — развернуть полевую экспертизу или выдвинуть обвинение значит поставить под удар успех операции. Нужна подготовка. Информация. Точные данные, факты. Преимущество".

languages.text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."
languages.original_text: "Я собирал информацию — без этого предпринимать меры было бы опрометчиво. Сейчас время для согласования действий и обсуждения рисков — а они велики, учитывая, что мы в меньшинстве и на незнакомой территории".

traits.locale_text: "I have been collecting information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

"I have been collecting information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

"I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

languages.text: "Ich habe Informationen gesammelt. Es wäre fahrlässig gewesen, ohne ausreichende Datenlage etwas zu unternehmen. Nun ist es an der Zeit, unser Vorgehen zu koordinieren und die Risiken zu besprechen. Die hoch sind, wenn man bedenkt, dass wir sowohl in der Unterzahl als auch in unbekanntem Territorium sind."
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Informationen gesammelt. Es wäre fahrlässig gewesen, ohne ausreichende Datenlage etwas zu unternehmen. Nun ist es an der Zeit, unser Vorgehen zu koordinieren und die Risiken zu besprechen. Die hoch sind, wenn man bedenkt, dass wir sowohl in der Unterzahl als auch in unbekanntem Territorium sind."

languages.text: « Parce qu'il serait imprudent d'agir avant d'avoir rassemblé suffisamment d'informations, ce que je suis en train de faire. Pour le moment, nous devons coordonner nos actions et discuter des risques... des risques élevés, étant donné que nous sommes en infériorité numérique et en territoire inconnu. »
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: « Parce qu'il serait imprudent d'agir avant d'avoir rassemblé suffisamment d'informations, ce que je suis en train de faire. Pour le moment, nous devons coordonner nos actions et discuter des risques... des risques élevés, étant donné que nous sommes en infériorité numérique et en territoire inconnu. »

languages.text: 「これまで情報を集めていました。それをせずに行動を起こすのは無謀というものです。今こそ、行動を調整し、リスクについて話し合うべき時です―こちらは数で劣っており、さらに未知の領域にいることを考えれば、リスクは極めて高い」
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: 「これまで情報を集めていました。それをせずに行動を起こすのは無謀というものです。今こそ、行動を調整し、リスクについて話し合うべき時です―こちらは数で劣っており、さらに未知の領域にいることを考えれば、リスクは極めて高い」

languages.text: «He estado recopilando información. Actuar sin este paso previo habría sido atolondrado. Ahora es el momento de coordinar nuestras acciones y debatir los riesgos, que son considerables dado que nos superan en número y estamos en territorio desconocido».
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: «He estado recopilando información. Actuar sin este paso previo habría sido atolondrado. Ahora es el momento de coordinar nuestras acciones y debatir los riesgos, que son considerables dado que nos superan en número y estamos en territorio desconocido».

languages.text: “我一直在收集情报，而在完成收集之前，无论采取什么措施都是鲁莽之举。至于现在，是时候协调我们的计划，讨论一下风险了。考虑到我们人数上处于下风，而且身处并不熟悉的区域，当前的风险程度很高。”
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: “我一直在收集情报，而在完成收集之前，无论采取什么措施都是鲁莽之举。至于现在，是时候协调我们的计划，讨论一下风险了。考虑到我们人数上处于下风，而且身处并不熟悉的区域，当前的风险程度很高。”

languages.text: "İstihbarat peşindeydim. Hazırlıksız herhangi bir adım atmak pervasızlık olurdu. Şimdi sıradaki hamlemizi planlayıp mevcut riskleri konuşmalıyız. Sayıca üstün oldukları ve yabancı bir bölgede olduğumuz düşünülürse büyük bir risk alıyoruz."
languages.original_text: "I have been gathering information. Taking any steps before doing that would have been reckless. Now is the time to coordinate our actions and discuss the risks — which are high, considering we are both outnumbered and in unknown territory."

traits.locale_text: "İstihbarat peşindeydim. Hazırlıksız herhangi bir adım atmak pervasızlık olurdu. Şimdi sıradaki hamlemizi planlayıp mevcut riskleri konuşmalıyız. Sayıca üstün oldukları ve yabancı bir bölgede olduğumuz düşünülürse büyük bir risk alıyoruz."
